singleItemContent: What can you see from the windows where you live?
Is there good scenery in your hometown?
Do you like to take pictures of scenery?
When you travel, do you like to live in hotels with scenic views?
Describe a computer/phone game you enjoy playing since your childhood.
And explain why you enjoy playing it
Why do more and more young people like playing electronic games?
What will happen if teenagers spend too much time playing computer games?
Should parents and teachers prevent children from playing games?
What are the benefits of playing electronic games?
